blocks.text: Atlético Demolish Barcelona, Arsenal Stumble at Brentford
A night of contrasts as Atlético Madrid produced a stunning 4-0 Copa del Rey rout of Barcelona, while Premier League leaders Arsenal were held 1-1 at Brentford, allowing City to close the gap.
⚽ Atlético Madrid 4-0 Barcelona — Copa del Rey demolition sends Barça crashing out
⚽ Brentford 1-1 Arsenal — Leaders drop points, City lurk four behind
⛳ Hovland T46 (-5) at Pebble Beach — Norwegian struggles through Round 3, 20 shots off lead
